docs.snippet: A Urugayan travel agent was found murdered early yesterday morning in his seventhfloor room at the New York Hilton Hotel. No money or valuables were found in the room, which showed signs of a fierce struggle.
docs.lead_paragraph: A Urugayan travel agent was found murdered early yesterday morning in his seventhfloor room at the New York Hilton Hotel. No money or valuables were found in the room, which showed signs of a fierce struggle.
docs.abstract: Franchi, J C: Urugayan travel agent, found slain his room at NY Hilton Hotel

headline.main: URUGUAYAN SLAIN IN HIS HOTEL HERE; Fierce Struggle by Visiting Travel Aide Indicated

docs.snippet: PRINCETON, N. J., Nov. 9 -- A 13-nation survey of attitudes toward interracial and interreligious marriages finds Americans most opposed and Swedes least opposed to marriages between whites and nonwhites.
docs.lead_paragraph: PRINCETON, N. J., Nov. 9 -- A 13-nation survey of attitudes toward interracial and interreligious marriages finds Americans most opposed and Swedes least opposed to marriages between whites and nonwhites.
docs.abstract: 13-nation survey of attitudes toward interracial and interreligious marriages shows Amers most opposed and Swedes least opposed to marriages between whites and nonwhites; survey made by Gallup-affiliated orgns with over 15,000 persons, from Finland to Uruguay, int in their homes; results tabulated; poll shows marriages between Roman Caths and Prots and those between Jews and non-Jews approved in 12 out of 13 countries; tables

headline.main: U.S. Found Most Opposed to Interracial Marriage

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 10 (AP) -- Vittorio Marcelli of Italy finished first in the 120-mile road race today and won the world bicycle racing championship.
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 10 (AP) -- Vittorio Marcelli of Italy finished first in the 120-mile road race today and won the world bicycle racing championship.

docs.snippet: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 12 (UPI) -- The Government lifted drastic price and wage freezes imposed last June to check inflation. A decree authorized raises beginning next month and also said merchants could increase prices to meet higher costs "if...
docs.lead_paragraph: MONTEVIDEO, Uruguay, Nov. 12 (UPI) -- The Government lifted drastic price and wage freezes imposed last June to check inflation. A decree authorized raises beginning next month and also said merchants could increase prices to meet higher costs "if absolutely necessary."
docs.abstract: Govt lifts drastic price and wage freezes imposed in June to check inflation

docs.snippet: MEXICO CITY -- The Periferico is the road that girdles Mexico City the way the Belt Parkway does Brooklyn. It has cloverleafs and underpasses, just like the Belt. But for about 11 miles of its length, along the road leading to the Olympic Village, it...
docs.lead_paragraph: MEXICO CITY -- The Periferico is the road that girdles Mexico City the way the Belt Parkway does Brooklyn. It has cloverleafs and underpasses, just like the Belt. But for about 11 miles of its length, along the road leading to the Olympic Village, it has one thing the Belt Parkway does not have -- sculpture.
docs.abstract: H C Schonberg comment on controversy stirred by 19 monumental abstract sculptures made of concrete that have been placed along 11-mi Route of Friendship hwy leading to Olympic Village; illus

headline.main: Sculpture on Road in Mexico Fuels Debate; 19 Works Line Route to Olympic Village Wide Acclaim Won by a Belgian Piece

byline.original: By HAROLD C. SCHONBERGSpecial to The New York Times

docs.snippet: PRINCETON, Nov. 16 -- If travel wishes could be translated directly into actuality, the tiny nation of Switzerland might be overrun with tourists from the United States and many other nations of the world, according to the Gallup Poll.
docs.lead_paragraph: PRINCETON, Nov. 16 -- If travel wishes could be translated directly into actuality, the tiny nation of Switzerland might be overrun with tourists from the United States and many other nations of the world, according to the Gallup Poll.
docs.abstract: Gallup Poll finds France ranks 5th among countries Amers would most like to visit; was 1st choice by wide margin in '61 survey

headline.main: SWITZERLAND 1ST IN TOURIST POLL; Passes France as Favorite of Potential Travelers

byline.original: Special to The New York Times

docs.snippet: CARACAS, Dec. 1 -- Venezuelans voted in at atmosphere of tranquility today on their fourth free election of this century.
